resources.string: Select to show the Hello Toast
Select to show the Vuzix Toast
Select to show the Blade Toast
Launch Around Content Lock style activity
Show Pop Up Menu style activity
Center Content style means that the View or real-state available is in the center and its lock to that position. The Action menus move underneath the main UI area.

Popup menu style means that the actions menu are hidden. Giving you full real state. The Action menu will "Pop Up" with a Single Tap on the touch pad. To Hide the Action Menu do a two finger tap(back gesture)
Around Content style means that the View or real-state available is AROUND the center of the screen.
The Action menus move in the CENTER of the main UI area.
